name: Hallow Hunt
description:
Hallow Hunt is a roguelike top down shooter set during halloween in a strange cemetery, where there are unknown forces guiding everything. With the resources derived from these forces, you can save the land of the undead from spooky spirits... well, at least you can try

  • Random maps - with almost infinite possibilities, it makes the game always different from the last time 
  • Imersive environments - the visual effects combined with sound effects adds a mesmerizing atmosphere 
  • Spooky enemies - various enemies will be on your path to save this world, with different behaviours and always trying to stop you from completing your journey
  • Frightening bosses - the bosses are a little different from the regular weapons, they have multiple stages, making the player learn how to defeat them, but make no mistake: their only goal is to kill you
  • Skills and special items -  there are plenty of skills and special items in the game, always found in skill chests, which can give you help through this journey
  • Trick or treat - you can collect sweets to trade with the cat in the store for some special items or weapons
  • WASD - movement
  • Space - use item
  • E - interact
  • LMB - shoot
  • Mouse scroll - switch weapon
